attributes.action: Reduce the Fuel Duty for a change instead of putting it up
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick of having to pay extortionate amounts for my petrol. Everytime petrol prices drop, fuel duty goes up NEVER down. It is about time the overtaxed English motorist was given a break.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/fairroadcharging/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
